We went to go visit the local museum that day. Of all the interesting exhibits and displays, the outdoor park was the main highlight of that trip. An aged and well-worn bridge extended into the area, leading to a pathway lined with lush, green trees. At the end of the trail, there was a magnificent waterfall awaiting us.
